parameters.name: AbnormalLevel
parameters.description:
The level of the risk. Valid values:

* **high**
* **medium**
* **low**

parameters.name: AbnormalTag
parameters.description:
The type of the risk.

>  You can call the [DescribeApisecRules](~~2859155~~) operation to query the supported types of risks.

parameters.name: ApiId
parameters.description: The ID of the risk-related API.

parameters.name: ApiTag
parameters.description:
The business purpose of the API.

>  You can call the [DescribeApisecRules](~~2859155~~) operation to query the business purposes of APIs.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the hybrid cloud cluster.

>  This parameter is available only in hybrid cloud scenarios. You can call the [DescribeHybridCloudClusters](~~2849376~~) operation to query hybrid cloud clusters.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp displayed in UTC. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the WAF instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: MatchedHost
parameters.description: The domain name or IP address of the API.

parameters.name: OrderKey
parameters.description:
The name of the sorting field. Valid values:

*   **discoverTime** (default): indicates the time when a risk was first detected.
*   **abnormalLevel**: indicates the level of a risk.
*   **latestDiscoverTime**: indicates the time when a risk was last detected.

parameters.name: OrderWay
parameters.description:
The sorting method. Valid values:

* **desc (default)**: in descending order
* **asc**: in ascending order

parameters.name: Origin
parameters.description:
The source of the risk type. Valid values:

* **custom**
* **default**

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the WAF instance. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp displayed in UTC. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: UserStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the risk. Valid values:

* **toBeConfirmed**
* **confirmed**
* **toBeFixed**
* **fixed**
* **ignored**
